scripts.insert-host: sudo hostile set 127.0.0.1 jumprock_elementor_hello.test && sudo hostile set 127.0.0.1 mailhog.jumprock_elementor_hello.test
scripts.kill-all-docker: [[ ! -z $(docker ps -q) ]] && docker kill $(docker ps -q) || echo ok
scripts.start: yarn kill-all-docker && yarn generate-env && docker-compose up
scripts.generate-certificate: cd docker && mkdir -p certs && cd certs && yarn generate-certificate-mailhog && yarn generate-certificate-site
scripts.generate-certificate-mailhog: cd docker/certs && [ -e mailhog.jumprock_elementor_hello.test.pem ] && echo mailhog cert exits || mkcert -install mailhog.jumprock_elementor_hello.test
scripts.generate-certificate-site: cd docker/certs && [ -e jumprock_elementor_hello.test.pem ] && echo site cert exits  || mkcert -install jumprock_elementor_hello.test
scripts.repo-setup: yarn postinstall && composer install && yarn generate-certificate && yarn insert-host
